Test: public void testSimpleInitialOffsets() throws Exception { JsonLocation loc; JsonParser p; final String DOC = "{ }"; p = JSON_F.createParser(DOC); loc = p.getTokenLocation(); loc = p.getCurrentLocation(); p.close(); p = JSON_F.createParser(DOC.getBytes("UTF-8")); loc = p.getTokenLocation(); loc = p.getCurrentLocation(); p.close(); }
Code: public JsonLocation getTokenLocation() { final Object src = _ioContext.getSourceReference(); return new JsonLocation(src, -1L, getTokenCharacterOffset(), getTokenLineNr(), getTokenColumnNr()); }
